channel.title: Do It Real-Time on David Braun
channel.description: Recent content in Do It Real-Time on David Braun

item.title: TD-JUCE
item.description: C++ TouchDesigner plugin for VSTs and JUCE.

item.title: DawDreamer
item.description: DawDreamer is an audio-processing Python framework supporting core DAW features such as audio playback, VST MIDI instruments, VST effects, and parameter automation.

item.title: Boids @ 120 FPS
item.description: “Boid” simulation at 120 FPS in TouchDesigner, using compute shaders and dynamic object avoidance.

item.title: Real-time Salient Object Detection
item.description: C++ TouchDesigner plugin running U^2-Net at 30 FPS.

item.title: Van Gogh
item.description: Van Gogh is part of a series titled Radiosity. A light-collecting raymarching algorithm enables real-time rendering of dynamic 2D scenes.

item.title: Weighted Linde-Buzo-Gray Stippling
item.description: GLSL compute shaders, the jump-flood algorithm, and a weighted voronoi particle relaxation algorithm combine to yield real-time animated stippling art.

item.title: TensorFlow Sinkhorn Algorithm
item.description: Optimal transport of particles in real-time with the TensorFlow C++ API.

item.title: Face Space
item.description: Real-time lookup of similar face landmarks from 2000 album art images.

item.title: PyTorch-TOP
item.description: C++ TouchDesigner plugin for real-time style transfer with PyTorch.

item.title: Face-CHOP
item.description: C++ TouchDesigner plugin for real-time face landmark detection.

item.title: KD-Tree Layers
item.description: Loading a K-D tree on the GPU to instantiate and distort geometry in real-time.

item.title: KD-Tree
item.description: Loading a K-D tree on the GPU to instantiate and distort geometry in real-time.

item.title: Binary Gradient
item.description: For 3 months in 2018, I was a Creator In Lab at the Asia Culture Center in Gwangju, South Korea.
